message: I'm excited to sell you this product, Bob! I think you'll really like it. Would you be interested in buying it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $90, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice! I can do $80, which is the price I was thinking of all along. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can do $100, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
